content: Hello! Thanks for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. Can I have your name to get started with your service request?
Thanks, Michael! Could you please provide your address so we can check if you’re within our service area?
I’d rather not share that right now, actually. Can you stop messaging me?
Of course, Michael. I’ve added you to our do not contact list and you won’t receive any more messages from us. If you ever need anything, feel free to reach out. Take care!
reason: Customer requested not to be contacted further.
